page.title: 18DEEPING ST.JAMES PRIORY FARM
page.content: The farm has been in the farmer's family since 1941.Since then the farm has doubled in size.In 1972 the farmer owned 5 tractors,4 under 50 horsepower and 1 under 80 horsepower.Today the farmer ownes 4 tractors,3 over 50 hor- sepower and 1 which is 135 horsepower. In 1972 4 workers worked full time on the farm.Today the farmer and his bro- ther do all the work on their own with the help of their machinery.Even the varieties of crops have changed. The farmer has changed his varieties of barley,wheat,peas and oil seed rape for a better yield. Out of all the years he has been on the farm 1984 gave him the best yield because of the right weather,dry autumn,wet spring,and a dry harvest. In 1986 the farm yard building is going be converted into some houses and a new grain store.
